snippet: Dasha Zhukova’s dinner at the illustrious art fair drew the likes of Peter Brant, Stephanie Seymour, Daphne Guinness, Vito Schnabel and more.

headline.main: A Star-Studded Dinner in Basel for the Artist Theaster Gates
